column4: help: I was just wondering how I can share files between two Ubuntu boxes?
I was just wondering how I can share files between two Ubuntu boxes?
use samba
yep sharing a folder using samba on one machine but can't se that folder from this machine
did you install samba on both machines?
make sure :)
yeah I think so
well I got files off a windows machine using this machine before, so I assumed
go to Places > Connect to server and try that way
hey I can sort of do it but it keeps on looping asking for my password??
I dont know why it isnt letting you connect..but you said you werent sure if samba was installed on the second machine
oh I am pretty sure
its just that I am trying to get stuff off this installation
burn it two a cd and copy it over
I am talking 67gb of stuff
oh lol that wont work
comlicated story but yeah
thanks man
np wish I could of helped more
check out gftp
oooo good thinking set up an ftp
